songs.title: Flashlight (Sweet Life Mix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

When tomorrow comes, I’ll be on my own
Feeling frightened of the things that I don’t know
When tomorrow comes
When tomorrow comes
When tomorrow comes
And though the road is long
I look up to the sky
Darkness all around I hope that I could fly
Then I sing along, I sing alone, then I sing alone

[Chorus]

I got all I need when I got you and I
Cause I look around me, and see a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
Can’t stop my heart when you’re shinin’ in my eyes
Can’t lie, It’s a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
You’re my flashlight (flashlight)
You’re my flashlight (flashlight)
You’re my flashlight

[Verse 2]

I see the shadows long beneath the mountain top
But I’m not afraid, when the rain won’t stop
Cause you light the way
You light the way, you light the way

[Chorus]

I got all I need when I got you and I
Cause I look around me, and see a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
Can’t stop my heart when you’re shinin’ in my eyes
Can’t lie, it’s a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
Light, light in my flashlight
Light, light, and you can’t deny
With you it’s a sweet life (life, life)
Oh-Ooh
I got all I need when I got you and I
Cause I look around me and see a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
Can’t stop my heart when you’re shinin’ in my eyes
Can’t lie, it’s a sweet life
I’m stuck in the dark but you’re my flashlight
You’re gettin’ me, gettin’ me through the night
You’re my flashlight
You’re my flashlight
You’re my flashlight (ooh)
You’re my flashlight
You’re my flashlight
You’re my flashlight
Yeah, Ooh
